entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 this morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
